lines: 1. Be Iseyudo Jawar maber,moloyo duto me piny,Mochiwo ngima mar wari,motho chuth ni richoni.
Be iseyudo jawar maber,Dikwed hera ma kama?Adier onge hera maduong`,chiwo ngimani ni Ruoth.(Ni Ruoth).
2. Be iseyudo Jawar mabermokadho e liel ne in,Mochodo tuech mar thoni,tekone nyalo resi.
3. Be iseyudo Jawar maber,be ing`eyo muolo gi kuwe,Mopong`o chuny ji magene,ma heragi tut kuome.
4. Be iseyudo Jawar maber,dware ma onge deko,Bil mitne maonge deko,nogol richowa oko.
